The letter, which Politico obtained, reads: Right-wing groups are once again attempting to destroy an organization dedicated to providing crucial primary care services to Americans that need them most. Armed with heavily edited videos, countless lies and a shameless echo chamber that repeats unfounded accusations ad nauseam, they've now turned their sights to Planned Parenthood, which offers a range of important health and reproductive services. a strategy call the liberal "media watchdog" group Media Matters coordinated with Planned Parenthood President Cecile Richards and other liberal activists, with support from liberal billionaire George Soros , designed to respond to the videos. However the former Pentagon chief also admitted his biggest error during his tenure under President Bush was his failure to convince the president to accept his resignation in the wake of the Abu Ghraib prison scandal. That was such a stain on our country. To think that people in our custody were treated in that disgusting and perverted and ghastly way-- unacceptable way, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News anchor Diane Sawyer . Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system." Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said, "While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
